txt.en: Hórin can be called to your side with the Call Hórin item.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin.
The ice-giants have chosen to ally with the Frost-horde and the Angmarim.\n\nYou should defeat ice-giants in Thyrstáth.
The ice-giants have chosen to side with the Frost-horde in the Gundabad conflict, making them your enemy.
'Ice, stone, or flesh: all will fall before the axes of dwarves!'

'The ice-giants have made their choice. If they ally with the Frost-horde, they have become enemies of the dwarves. You know what we do with enemies, [placeholder]... even such large enemies as these.'
Call Hórin and talk to him
